mapper.select: /*compny.selectCompnyInfo*/ SELECT A.USER_SEQ , FN_GET_COMPNY_NM(B.COMPNY_SEQ, #{langCd}) AS COMPNY_NM , B.COMPNY_SEQ , B.COMPNY_TYPE_CD , FN_GET_COMMON_NM('COMPNY_TYPE_CD', B.COMPNY_TYPE_CD, #{langCd}) AS COMPNY_TYPE_NM , B.REG_NUM , B.PATENT_NUM , B.OWNER_NATION_CD , B.ADDR_CD , B.ADDR_DTL , B.ADDR_FULL_CD , B.ADDR_FULL_NM , B.MAIN_JOB_PERCENT , B.MNGER_NM , B.MNGER_POSITION , B.MNGER_CELL , B.MNGER_EMAIL , B.MNGER_TEL , B.COMPNY_FAX , B.COMPNY_WEBSITE , B.COMPNY_FACEBOOK , B.PROFILE , B.DISABL_EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , B.EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , B.EXE_EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , B.FEMALE_EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , B.FORGNER_TOT_CNT , B.GOOGLE_MAP_LINK , B.FILE_GRP_SEQ , B.LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ , FN_GET_FILE_PATH(B.LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ) AS FILE_PATH , B.BKMK_CNT , B.ISIC_CD , FN_GET_ISIC_NM(B.ISIC_CD, #{langCd}) AS ISIC_NM , ( SELECT BKMK_SEQ FROM CPES_BKMK F WHERE F.CATE_CD = 'BCT0000000001' AND F.TABLE_KEY_SEQ = B.COMPNY_SEQ AND F.USER_SEQ = #{condUserSeq} ) AS BKMK_SEQ FROM CPES_USER A INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE B.COMPNY_SEQ = #{condSeq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
/*compny.selectVacancyContinueListCnt*/ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_VACANCY A INNER JOIN CPES_COMPNY B ON A.COMPNY_SEQ = B.COMPNY_SEQ WHERE B.COMPNY_SEQ = #{condSeq}

/*compny.selectCompnyByUserSeq*/ SELECT COMPNY_SEQ , COMPNY_NM_KH , COMPNY_TYPE_CD , USER_ID , JC_CD , REG_NUM , PATENT_NUM , OWNER_NATION_CD , EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , FEMALE_EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , DISABL_EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , FORGNER_TOT_CNT , MAIN_JOB_NM , MAIN_JOB_PERCENT , ADDR_DTL , ADDR_CD , LNGTD , LATTD , PROFILE , REG_USER_SEQ , REG_DT , MOD_USER_SEQ , MOD_DT , COMPNY_ID , USER_SEQ , ISIC_CD , FILE_GRP_SEQ , ISCO_CD , BKMK_CNT , JC_USER_SEQ , LIKE_CNT , MNGER_NM , MNGER_POSITION , MNGER_CELL , MNGER_EMAIL , MNGER_TEL , COMPNY_FAX , COMPNY_WEBSITE , COMPNY_FACEBOOK , USE_YN , COMPNY_NM_EN , DEL_YN , ADDR_FULL_CD , ADDR_FULL_NM , EXE_EMPLOYEE_TOT_CNT , COMPNY_HIS , LOGO_FILE_GRP_SEQ , GOOGLE_MAP_LINK , SUB_MNGER_NM , SUB_MNGER_POSITION , SUB_MNGER_CELL , SUB_MNGER_EMAIL , CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN COMPNY_NM_KH ELSE COMPNY_NM_EN END AS COMPNY_NM FROM CPES_COMPNY A WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} LIMIT 1
